relation.text: May 10 th - My dearest Mrs Dickenson We are all much obliged
wrote to us . & are very impatient for a repetition of the same treat . but I have now
attends all Fairs & Markets is too good an evidence . of the dispositions of the common people -- we had letters from London yesterday
slept at Aylsbury one Night last Week
goes to London the latter end of this Month
will be down the middle of June
